How can we purchase an NFT through Xanalia?
XANALIA has two selling methods.
You can either buy the NFT at a fixed price or take part in an auction.
How does the auction process work?
If you wish to buy an NFT, you bid for it.
If your bid is the highest, you will buy it. But if someone else made the highest bid, your money will return to your wallet.
When can we bid?
It depends on the bidding time set by the seller.
What happens if there is no auction?
@C It's simple then. The seller sets a fixed price at which the buyer makes the purchase.
